name: explo
description: Explo is a data exploration and dashboarding tool that connects to databases or warehouses and lets users build charts and dashboards visually. Itâ€™s designed to be used by analysts and engineers who prefer self-hosted analytics.
features: Data Exploration: Connect to databases and warehouses. Analyze data visually.
